context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: Good morning! Do you wake up early?

strings.value: Ha, men har kuni soat 6 da turaman.

context.speaker: Sara
context.en_line: Yes, I wake up at 6 AM every day.

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: What do you do first?

strings.value: Men tishlarimni yuvaman va dush qabul qilaman.

context.speaker: Sara
context.en_line: I brush my teeth and take a shower.

strings.value: Men ertalabni yoqtirmayman. Siz mashq qilasizmi?

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: I don't like mornings. Do you exercise?

strings.value: Ha, men har ertalab yuguraman. Bu siz uchun yaxshi.

context.speaker: Sara
context.en_line: Yes, I run every morning. It's good for you.

strings.value: Bu yaxshi eshitiladi. Siz nonushta qilasizmi?

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: That sounds nice. Do you eat breakfast?

strings.value: Ha, men soat 7 da katta nonushta qilaman.

context.speaker: Sara
context.en_line: Yes, I eat a big breakfast at 7 AM.

context.speaker: Bekzod
context.en_line: What time do you start work?

strings.value: Men har kuni soat 9 da boshlayman.

context.speaker: Madina
context.en_line: I start at 9 AM every day.

context.speaker: Bekzod
context.en_line: Do you study English?

strings.value: Ha, men ishdan keyin kuniga ikki soat o'qiyman.

context.speaker: Madina
context.en_line: Yes, I study two hours a day after work.

context.speaker: Bekzod
context.en_line: That's good! What about sports?

strings.value: Men dam olish kunlari futbol o'ynayman.

context.speaker: Madina
context.en_line: I play football on weekends.

context.speaker: Bekzod
context.en_line: Do you work on Saturdays?

strings.value: Yo'q, men dam olish kunlari ishlamayman.

context.speaker: Madina
context.en_line: No, I don't work on weekends.

context.speaker: Nilufar
context.en_line: How often do you exercise?

strings.value: Men har doim haftada uch marta mashq qilaman.

context.speaker: Kamila
context.en_line: I always exercise three times a week.

context.speaker: Nilufar
context.en_line: What about your diet?

strings.value: Men odatda uyda sog'lom ovqat yeyman.

context.speaker: Kamila
context.en_line: I usually eat healthy food at home.

context.speaker: Nilufar
context.en_line: Do you ever eat out?

strings.value: Ba'zan men do'stlarim bilan restoranda ovqatlanaman.

context.speaker: Kamila
context.en_line: Sometimes I eat at restaurants with friends.

strings.value: Bu yaxshi eshitiladi. Kechqurun nima qilasiz?

context.speaker: Nilufar
context.en_line: That sounds good. What do you do in the evening?

strings.value: Men odatda uxlashdan oldin televizor ko'raman yoki kitob o'qiyman.

context.speaker: Kamila
context.en_line: I usually watch TV or read books before bed.

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: Is there a coffee shop near your office?

context.speaker: Bekzod
context.en_line: Yes, there's a good coffee shop downstairs.

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: Are there computers in your office?

strings.value: Ha, o'ttizta kompyuter bor. Biz ularni har kuni ishlatamiz.

context.speaker: Bekzod
context.en_line: Yes, there are thirty computers. We use them every day.

strings.value: Bu yaxshi eshitiladi. Sizda noutbuk bormi?

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: That sounds nice. Do you have a laptop?

strings.value: Ha, mening shaxsiy noutbukam bor. Men usiz ishlamayman.

context.speaker: Bekzod
context.en_line: Yes, I have my own laptop. I don't work without it.

strings.value: Oila-chi? Sizda aka-uka yoki opa-singillar bormi?

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: What about family? Do you have siblings?

strings.value: Mening bitta singlim bor. U universitetda o'qiydi.

context.speaker: Bekzod
context.en_line: I have one sister. She studies at university.

context.en_canonical: No, I wake up at 6 AM.
No, I wake up at 6 AM.
No, I wake up at 6 AM.

strings.value: 'Wake up' — bu frazel fe'l. 'Wake' + 'up' birga keladi va 'uyg'onmoq' ma'nosini beradi.
Men har kuni soat 6 da uyg'onaman.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men soat 7 da uyg'onaman.
'Morning' — kun boshidagi vaqt. 'Good morning' — salomlashish shakli. Artiklsiz ham ishlatiladi.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men har ertalab yuguraman.

context.en_canonical: No, I brush my teeth every day.

strings.value: Yo'q, men har kuni tishimni yuvaman.

context.en_canonical: No, I brush my teeth every day.

strings.value: Yo'q, men tishlarimni yuvaman har kuni.

context.en_canonical: No, I brush my teeth every day.

strings.value: To'g'ri! 'Brush' = tish yuvmoq yoki soch taramoq.
Ingliz tilida tish uchun 'wash' emas, 'BRUSH' ishlatiladi — cho'tka bilan tozalash ma'nosida. 'Brush hair' ham shunday.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men tishimni yuvaman.
Siz kuniga necha marta tish yuvaysiz?
'Tooth' → 'Teeth' — bu irregular plural. Qoidasiz ko'plik shakl. 'Foot → feet', 'goose → geese' kabi.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Mening tishlarim toza.
To'g'ri! 'Take a shower' = dush qabul qilmoq.
'Take a shower' yoki 'have a shower' — to'g'ri. 'Make' bu yerda ishlatilmaydi. Bu collocation (birga ishlatiladigan so'zlar).
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men dush qabul qilaman.
⚠️ 'Make' emas! 'Take a shower' yoki 'Have a shower'.
Ovqat nomlari (breakfast, lunch, dinner) oldidan artiklsiz ishlatiladi. 'I eat breakfast' — to'g'ri. 'I eat THE breakfast' — noto'g'ri.
Men soat 7 da katta nonushta qilaman.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men har kuni nonushta qilaman.
'I/you/we/they' bilan 'eat' (s siz). 'He/she/it' bilan 'eats' (s bilan). Bu Present Simple qoidasidir.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men olma yeyman.

context.en_canonical: No, I don't work on weekends.

strings.value: Yo'q, men dam olish kunlari ishlamayman.

context.en_canonical: No, I don't work on weekends.

strings.value: Yo'q, men ishlamayman dam olish kunlari.

context.en_canonical: No, I don't work on weekends.

strings.value: Present Simple inkorida 'do not' (don't) yordamchi fe'l ishlatiladi. 'I don't work' — to'g'ri. 'I not work' — noto'g'ri.
Yo'q, men dam olish kunlari ishlamayman.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men ofisda ishlayman.
Aniq vaqt bilan 'at' ishlatiladi: 'at 9 AM', 'at 6 o'clock'. 'IN' emas, 'AT' — vaqt uchun.
Men har kuni soat 9 da boshlayman.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men soat 8 da boshlayman.
'Study' → 'studies' (y → ies). Lekin 'play' → 'plays' (undosh + y bo'lganda). Qoida: undosh + y = ies.
Ha, men kuniga ikki soat o'qiyman.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men har kuni o'qiyman.
Tillar nomi har doim katta harf bilan yoziladi: English, Uzbek, Russian. Bu qoida.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men ingliz tilini o'rganaman.
Siz nima uchun ingliz tilini o'rganasiz?
Sport nomlari bilan artiklsiz ishlatiladi: 'play football', 'play tennis'. 'THE' kerak emas.
Men dam olish kunlari futbol o'ynayman.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men futbol o'ynayman.
⚠️ Sport bilan 'THE' kerak emas! 'I play football' to'g'ri.
'Foot' + 'ball' = 'football'. Bu compound noun (qo'shma otlar). Ingliz tilida ko'p bunday so'zlar bor: basketball, bedroom.
Yo'q, men faqat dam olish kunlari ishlayman.
Yo'q, men ishlayman dam olish kunlari.
Kunlar va sanalar bilan 'ON' ishlatiladi: 'on Monday', 'on weekends', 'on Friday'. 'IN' emas.
Biz dam olish kunlari parkka boramiz.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Dam olish kunlari.
Chastota ravishlarini (always, often, usually) asosiy fe'ldan oldin qo'yiladi: 'I OFTEN run'. Lekin 'be' dan keyin: 'He IS often late'.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men ko'pincha kitob o'qiyman.
Yo'q, men har doim nonushta qilaman.
Yo'q, men har doim nonushta qilaman.
'Always' = har doim, 100% kafolatli. Chastota shkala: always (100%) > usually (80%) > often (60%) > sometimes (40%) > never (0%).
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men har doim suv ichaman.
'Usually' = odatda (80-90%). 'Always' = har doim (100%). 'I usually walk' = ko'pincha yuraman, lekin har doim emas.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men odatda kitob o'qiyman.
'Sometimes' moslashuvchan — gap boshida yoki fe'ldan oldin turishi mumkin: 'Sometimes I run' yoki 'I sometimes run'. Ikkalasi ham to'g'ri!
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men ba'zan futbol o'ynayman.
'Never' o'zi inkor ma'nosini beradi, shuning uchun 'don't' kerak emas. 'I never smoke' = to'g'ri. 'I don't never smoke' = NOTO'G'RI (ikki inkor).
Men hech qachon zararli ovqat yemayman.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men hech qachon kech qolmayman.
'Every' dan keyin birlik otlar keladi: 'every day', 'every week', 'every student'. Ko'plik qo'shilmaydi!
'A week' = har qanday bir hafta. 'This week' = shu hafta. 'Three times a week' = haftada uch marta ('a' = 'per' ma'nosida).
Men haftada uch marta mashq qilaman.
Yo'q, men har kuni mashq qilaman.
Yo'q, men har kuni mashq qilaman.
'Exercise' ikki xil ishlatiladi: 1) Fe'l: 'I exercise every day' (mashq qilaman). 2) Ot: 'Exercise is good' (mashq foydali). Kontekst hal qiladi.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men har kuni mashq qilaman.
He/She/It bilan fe'lga '-s' qo'shiladi: 'He runs', 'She runs'. 'I/You/We/They' bilan 's' yo'q: 'I run', 'They run'.
Ingliz tilida ayting: U parkda yuguradi.
Ingliz tilida sifat otdan OLDIN keladi: 'healthy food' (sog'lom ovqat), 'big house' (katta uy). O'zbek tilidagi tartibga o'xshaydi.

context.en_canonical: No, let's go to a restaurant.
No, let's go to a restaurant.
No, let's go to a restaurant.

strings.value: 'At' \u2014 aniq joy uchun ishlatiladi: 'at a restaurant', 'at home', 'at school'. 'In' \u2014 ichkarisini ta'kidlash uchun.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men restoranda yeyman.
Egalik olmoshlari: 'my', 'your', 'his', 'her'. 'My friend' = mening do'stim. 'Me' \u2014 boshqa holatlarda ishlatiladi.
Ingliz tilida ayting: U mening do'stim.
'Go home' = uyga borish. 'Home' bilan 'TO' kerak emas! 'I go home' to'g'ri, 'I go to home' noto'g'ri. Lekin 'at home' = uyda.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men uyga boraman.
'What time...?' = Soat nechida? 'What time do you start?' = Soat nechada boshlaysiz? 'Time' ko\u2019p qirral\u0131 so\u2019z: vaqt, marta, davr.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Menda vaqt yo'q.
'Morning', 'afternoon', 'evening' bilan 'IN' ishlatiladi: 'in the morning', 'in the evening'. Lekin 'night' bilan 'AT': 'at night'.
'Watch' = diqqat bilan ko'rish (TV, film). 'See' = ko'rish (tasodifiy). 'Look' = qarash. 'I watch TV', lekin 'I see a bird'.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men kino ko'raman.
'TV' = 'Television' qisqartmasi. 'Watch TV' = televizor ko'rmoq. 'Turn on the TV' = televizorni yoqmoq. Hissiy gap bilan 'a TV' ishlatiladi.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men televizorni yoqtiraman.
'Read' (hozirgi: /riːd/) va 'read' (o'tgan: /red/) — bir xil yoziladi, lekin turlicha o'qiladi! Bu irregular verb.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men kitob o'qiyman.
Fe'l '-x', '-s', '-sh', '-ch' bilan tugasa, 3-shaxsda '-ES' qo'shiladi: 'relax → relaxes', 'watch → watches'. Oddiy '-s' emas!
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men uyda dam olaman.
'Sleep' — intransitive fe'l, ya'ni ob'yektsiz ishlatiladi: 'I sleep' (men uxlayman). 'I sleep a book' — NOTO'G'RI. Lekin 'I sleep 8 hours' — TO'G'RI (vaqt bilan).
'Go to bed' = uxlashga bormoq (umumiy ma'no). 'THE bed' = aniq yotoqni ko'rsatish uchun ishlatiladi. 'In bed' = yotoqda (umumiy).
Ingliz tilida ayting: Men yotoqga boraman (uxlashga).
'Have' — 'I/you/we/they' bilan. 'Has' — 'he/she/it' bilan. 'I have a book' ✓, 'She has a book' ✓, 'She have...' ✗.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Menda kitob bor.

context.en_canonical: Yes, there is a table here.
Yes, there is a table here.
Yes, there is a table here.

strings.value: 'There is' = birlikda (there is a book). 'There are' = ko'plikda (there are books). 'There' bu yerda joy emas, mavjudlikni bildiradi.
